episodes.title: Born in a Cult, Spiraled Into Addiction, Now Advises Fortune 500s | Petra Velzeboer
episodes.description:
From a religious cult to rock bottom addiction to helping Fortune 500 companies transform their workplace culture - Petra Velzeboer's story will stop you in your tracks.
In this raw and powerful conversation, mental health consultant and author Petra Velzeboer shares her journey from being born into a religious cult, spiraling into addiction as a young single mother, to becoming one of the leading voices on digital wellness and mental health in the workplace.

What We Cover:
🔹 Growing up in a religious cult and the moment everything changed
🔹 The brutal reality of addiction - and why one glass of wine led to checking her car for bodies after 2 weeks
🔹 Why "do the next right thing" became her life-saving mantra
🔹 The crisis of meaning and connection destroying modern workplaces
🔹 Why your phone is stealing your ability to feel your feelings (and why that's dangerous)
🔹 How to actually disconnect in a world that demands you're always on
🔹 The truth about digital detoxes and what actually works
🔹 Why wellness programs with yoga and pink posters completely miss the point
🔹 How to build real connection when everything is remote
🔹 What AI and technology are doing to our mental health (and what to do about it)

Key Takeaways:
✅ The number one skill for happiness is practicing bravery
✅ Your algorithm reveals who you are - use it intentionally
✅ Digital wellbeing = when technology supports YOUR intentions, not the other way around
✅ Things have to get worse before they get better
✅ The biggest workplace issue isn't perks - it's meaning and connection

About Petra Velzeboer:
Petra is a psychotherapist, mental health consultant, and author of "Digital Wellbeing" and "Begin With You." She works with global organizations helping them create mentally healthy cultures and high-performing teams. 17 years sober, she's living proof that transformation is possible.
